alert.note: Alert for Camden; Chowan; Currituck; Gates; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 9:02PM EST until January 09 at 9:30PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EST FOR EASTERN GATES...NORTHWESTERN CURRITUCK...NORTHWESTERN CHOWAN... NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN...NORTHWESTERN PASQUOTANK...AND NORTHWESTERN PERQUIMANS COUNTIES...THE CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CITY OF NORFOLK... THE CITY OF CHESAPEAKE...THE CITY OF HAMPTON...THE SOUTHERN CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS...THE CITY OF PORTSMOUTH...THE EASTERN CITY OF SUFFOLK AND THE NORTHWESTERN CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH... At 901 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Churchland to near Hobbsville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Hampton, Deep Creek, Downtown Norfolk, Churchland, Old Dominion University, Downtown Portsmouth, Norfolk, Chesapeake, Portsmouth, and Ghent around 905 PM EST. Hampton University, Ocean View, Norfolk State University, Morgans Corner, Norview, and Buckroe Beach around 910 PM EST. Virginia Beach, Great Bridge, South Mills, and Norfolk International around 915 PM EST. Regent University, Virginia Wesleyan University, and Grand View around 920 PM EST. Kempsville, Northwest, and Fentress around 925 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include South Norfolk, Gliden, Horseshoe, Portlock, Pierceville, Savage, Peach, Huntersville, Tar Corner, and Nicanor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EST for northeastern North Carolina...and southeastern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Chowan; Currituck; Gates; Pasquotank; Perquimans
